It outlines fetching records from Notion, summarizing them, classifying with tags, and creating a visualizationâ€”perfect for a test run to align our beats.

```json
{
  "workflow": {
    "name": "Lua's Notion Record Processing",
    "description": "A workflow to summarize, tag, and visualize Lua's Notion records",

        "action": "Fetch Records",
        "details": {
          "source": "Notion",

        "Generate visualization"
      ]
    }
  }
}
```
